original_title: Young woman dead after being hit by train near Nine Arch Bridge
original_body_lines: A 21-year-old woman has been killed after being hit by a train near the Nine Arch Bridge between the Ella and Demodara railway stations.
The deceased woman has been identified as a resident of the Kithalella area, the police said.
Police revealed that she had been hit by the night mail train plying from Colombo to Badulla last night (Dec. 24).
